template.name: EnemySquare

transition.label: i : int[0,1]
t >= SQUARE_SPEED && next[i][0] != -1 && next[i][1] != -1
prev_x = x, prev_y = y, x = next[i][0], y = next[i][1], t := 0
t >= SQUARE_SPAWN_INTERVAL * id
t := 0, square_alive[id] := true, square_health[id] := SQUARE_HEALTH, getNextPositions(x, y, prev_x, prev_y)
t >= SQUARE_SPEED
square_alive[id] := false, t := 0, mainTowerHP := mainTowerHP - SQUARE_DAMAGE
t >= SQUARE_SPEED && x == MAIN_X && y == MAIN_Y && mainTowerHP >= mainTowerHP - SQUARE_DAMAGE
t := 0

prev_x = x, prev_y = y, x = next[i][0], y = next[i][1], t := 0
t >= CIRCLE_SPAWN_INTERVAL * id

t >= CIRCLE_SPEED
mainTowerHP := mainTowerHP - CIRCLE_DAMAGE, circle_alive[id] := false, t := 0
